name: Dead and Dead Again
description: This game was made during San Diego Game Jam 2017 at the Art Institute of San Diego California. This project was made within 72 hours with the help of Octavio Avalos,  Sandra Alfaro, Erick Gonzolez, JB Edraisa, Jonathan Harding, Gennaro Gammieri and our wonderful mascot Mishka the Rhinabear.
